title: Solo Que online now but.......
body:
Whats the point of playing solo que now ? dont they said solo que will released when S7 starts ?
Do you have to play placement matches now ? 
Im confused .!

replies.body:
Right now is just the preseason, so you can simply practice playing Soloqueue before the official season starts when the games actually affect your real ranked standing. You can play soloqueue if you'd like, but you can also wait until the official season starts as well.

I hope that clears up the confusion! ^.^

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=PubPHzwh,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-22T02:38:07.656+0000)
>
> Right now is just the preseason, so you can simply practice playing Soloqueue before the official season starts when the games actually affect your real ranked standing. You can play soloqueue if you'd like, but you can also wait until the official season starts as well.
> 
> I hope that clears up the confusion! ^.^

Wait, I thought you guys said that pre-season ranked will have an effect on your season placements... am I wrong here?

It was stated that they would have a *slight impact*, not a direct or huge impact on your new season standing.

I hope that clears up the confusion.
